description: Observations on a development within the adjoining Borough of Wandsworth with respect to the construction and operation of a replacement waste transfer building measuring 2,277sqm in area and 14.5m high to the ridge (11.8m high at the eaves), a mess room, office/welfare facility, a weighbridge and office building, water tank and pump house. Theextension of the permitted operating hours to allow for 24 hour opening hours is proposed. An Environmental Statement has been submitted with the application under The Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017. [Reconsultation following the submission of a Supplementary Planning and Technical Note on 02/01/19 on transport, air quality,energy and sustainability and noise, and revised plans dated 06/03/19 to amend the design treatment of the buildings] at Pensbury Place , Transfer Station 661-679 Pensbury Place, Battersea SW8 4TP.
